rules_text: Mill four cards, then you may return up to two creature and/or Vehicle cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
[i]“Lookie there. A new ship, plenty o' treasure, and leverage with the Royal Armada, all sailin' right up to our port. The life of a pirate has never been so easy.”
—Captain Darwin Smythe[/i]
